news_header: Ukrainian Elle magazine features nine spouses of state leaders on its latest cover, highlighting their roles and addressing global challenges.
news_text: The latest issue of Ukrainian Elle magazine showcases nine partners of state leaders, with Suzanne Innes-Stuen, the President of the Republic, on the cover. The special edition focuses on the spouses of world leaders who gathered at a summit in Kiev to discuss global challenges, particularly concerning children. The magazine shared the cover photo on Instagram and includes interviews where the spouses share their perspectives on their roles alongside their partners.
